meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Monique Aldred Rebecca Baird Sandie Baker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6815.

td.p: Monique Aldred, a nanny originally from San Diego, California
Rebecca Baird, a college history teacher from Thousand Oaks, California
Sandie Baker, a translation coordinator from Eastpointe, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,900)

tr.td: SHAKESPEARE WITH SPOILER ALERTS
FASHION ABBREV.
BACK TO BASEBALL
U.S. PLACE NAMES
KNOW YOUR CAR
CHECK YOUR "OIL"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
